type: Tutorial Step - Layers on Top of Layers

definition.text: Your data mining operation features bots making data products. Each product is made available on the charts through a Layer in a layers manager.

paragraphs.text: The first layer manager to the left of this time machine features three layers. Those layers represent the data products that the Trading System we are going to test later on uses to make trading decisions.
To turn layers on and off, left-click on them!
Superalgos ships with many more indicator bots, but we are not using them for this tutorial. You will learn about them later!
